history.proof: intros. destruct s1. - simpl. apply H0. - destruct s1. + simpl. shelve. + simpl. apply and_comm. split. * shelve. * shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
Ord: T -> T -> Prop
s2: seq T
s1: seq T
x0: T

Goal:
sorted Ord s1 -> sorted Ord s2 -> Ord (last x0 s1) (head x0 s2) -> sorted Ord (s1 ++ s2)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
sorted = fix sorted (T : Type) (Ord : T -> T -> Prop) (s : seq T) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | [::] => True | [:: h0] => True | h0 :: (h1 :: _) as t0 => Ord h0 h1 /\ sorted T Ord t0 end : forall T : Type, (T -> T -> Prop) -> seq T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
sorted_nth : forall (Ord0 : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s : seq ?T), sorted Ord0 s < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s))%nat -> forall x1 : ?T, Ord0 (nth x1 s i) (nth x1 s (S i))) where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
head_map : forall (f : ?T1 -> ?T2) (s : seq ?T1) (x : ?T1), head (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (head x s) where ?T1 : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type] ?T2 : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
subseqP : reflect (exists2 m : seq bool, size m = size ?s2 & ?s1 = mask m ?s2) (subseq ?s1 ?s2) where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- eqtype.Equality.type] ?s1 : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)] ?s2 : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)]
last_unzip1 : forall (x1 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x1 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x1, y0) s) where ?S : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
rev_rev : forall l : seq ?T, rev (rev l) = l where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
seq_ind2 : forall P : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s = size t -> P s t -> P (x :: s) (y :: t)) -> forall (s : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s = size t -> P s t where ?S : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
Iter.iter_cat : forall (op : ?T -> ?T -> ?T) (x1 : ?T), (forall x : ?T, op x1 x = x) -> (forall x y z : ?T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z) -> forall (l1 l2 : seq ?I) (f : ?I -> ?T), Iter.iter op x1 (l1 ++ l2) f = op (Iter.iter op x1 l1 f) (Iter.iter op x1 l2 f) where ?I : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
head_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), head x1 (rev l) = last x1 l where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
last_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), last x1 (rev l) = head x1 l where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
head_rcons : forall (x1 : ?T) (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), head x1 (rcons s t) = head t s where ?T : [T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop s1 : seq T s2 : seq T x0 : T |- Type]
pairmap_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T1), pairmap f x (s1 ++ s2) = pairmap f x s1 ++ pairmap f (last x s1) s2
foldl_cat : forall (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) (z : R) (s1 s2 : seq T), foldl f z (s1 ++ s2) = foldl f (foldl f z s1) s2
scanl_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T2), scanl g x (s1 ++ s2) = scanl g x s1 ++ scanl g (foldl g x s1) s2
zip_cat : forall (S T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq S) (t1 t2 : seq T), size s1 = size t1 -> zip (s1 ++ s2) (t1 ++ t2) = zip s1 t1 ++ zip s2 t2
cat_subseq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), subseq s1 s3 -> subseq s2 s4 -> subseq (s1 ++ s2) (s3 ++ s4)
nth_cat : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s1 s2 : seq T) (n : nat), nth x0 (s1 ++ s2) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s1) then nth x0 s1 n else nth x0 s2 (ssrnat.subn n (size s1)))
takel_cat : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s1) -> take n0 (s1 ++ s2) = take n0 s1
foldr_cat : forall (T2 R : Type) (f : T2 -> R -> R) (z0 : R) (s1 s2 : seq T2), foldr f z0 (s1 ++ s2) = foldr f (foldr f z0 s2) s1
Iter.iter = fun (I T : Type) (op : T -> T -> T) (x0 : T) => fix iter (l : seq I) (f : I -> T) {struct l} : T := match l with | [::] => x0 | h :: l' => op (f h) (iter l' f) end : forall I T : Type, (T -> T -> T) -> T -> seq I -> (I -> T) -> T Arguments I, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope function_scope]
belast_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), seq.belast x (s1 ++ s2) = seq.belast x s1 ++ seq.belast (last x s1) s2
catrev = fun T : Type => fix catrev (s1 s2 : seq T) {struct s1} : seq T := match s1 with | [::] => s2 | x :: s1' => catrev s1' (x :: s2) end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope seq_scope]
take_size_cat : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (s1 s2 : seq T), size s1 = n -> take n (s1 ++ s2) = s1
drop_size_cat : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (s1 s2 : seq T), size s1 = n -> drop n (s1 ++ s2) = s2
mask_cat : forall (T : Type) (m1 m2 : bitseq) (s1 s2 : seq T), size m1 = size s1 -> mask (m1 ++ m2) (s1 ++ s2) = mask m1 s1 ++ mask m2 s2
cat = fun T : Type => fix cat (s1 s2 : seq T) {struct s1} : seq T := match s1 with | [::] => s2 | x :: s1' => x :: cat s1' s2 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope seq_scope]
last_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), last x (s1 ++ s2) = last (last x s1) s2
rot_size_cat : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), rot (size s1) (s1 ++ s2) = s2 ++ s1
subseq = fun T : eqtype.Equality.type => fix subseq (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) {struct s2} : bool := match s2 with | [::] => eqtype.eq_op s1 [::] | y :: s2' => match s1 with | [::] => true | x :: s1' => subseq (if eqtype.eq_op x y then s1' else s1) s2' end end : forall T : eqtype.Equality.type, seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T) -> seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T) -> bool Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ seq_scope seq_scope]
nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : seq T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: s' => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope nat_scope]
mkseq : forall T : Type, (nat -> T) -> nat -> seq T
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
take_cat : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), take n0 (s1 ++ s2) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s1) then take n0 s1 else s1 ++ take (ssrnat.subn n0 (size s1)) s2)
drop_cat : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), drop n0 (s1 ++ s2) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s1) then drop n0 s1 ++ s2 else drop (ssrnat.subn n0 (size s1)) s2)
PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
foldl = fun (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) => fix foldl (z : R) (s : seq T) {struct s} : R := match s with | [::] => z | x :: s' => foldl (f z x) s' end : forall T R : Type, (R -> T -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
ncons = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) => ssrnat.iter n (Datatypes.cons x) : forall T : Type, nat -> T -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope _ seq_scope]
rotr_size_cat : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), rotr (size s2) (s1 ++ s2) = s2 ++ s1
rot = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => drop n s ++ take n s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope seq_scope]
size_cat : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), size (s1 ++ s2) = ssrnat.addn (size s1) (size s2)

```coq
intros T Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3. unfold sorted in H1, H2. destruct s1.
- simpl. apply H2.
- destruct s1.
  + simpl. apply H1.
  + simpl. apply and_comm. split.
    * apply H1.
    * apply H3.
Qed.
Qed.```
